description: Conversion of roof from hip to gable end, reduced rear dormer and porch to front (Part retrospective)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be commenced not later than three years from the date of this permission.
To comply with the requirements of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004).
All new external finishes shall be carried out in materials to match those of the existing building(s) to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area, and in order that the development accords with Policy 26 of the Havering Local Plan.
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out otherwise than in complete accordance with the approved plans (as set out on page one of this decision notice).
For the avoidance of doubt and to ensure that the development is carried out as approved. Also, in order that the development accords with Policy 26 of the Havering Local Plan.

Notwithstanding the details shown on drawing no. 2022.561.05 Rev: A accompanying the application, the face and cheeks of the rear dormer window shall be tile hung to match the appearance of the roof of the existing dwelling unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area, and in order that the development accords with Policy 26 of the Havering Local Plan.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: In accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework, improvements required to make the proposal acceptable were negotiated with Mr Stroud (Agent) by phone and e-mail. The revisions involved the removal of the drop kerb onto Toby Way and clarity in respect to the actual position of No.79 Essex Road as altered on site. The amendments were subsequently submitted on 30-11-22 & 16-01-23.
